sent.orig: The president wanted to know who was in charge of this department.
sent.trans: 9总裁president想知道谁负责这个部门的工作。

sent.orig: The vice-president talked at the meeting in place of the president, because the president was sick.
sent.trans: 副主席代替主席在会上讲了话，因为主席病了。

sent.orig: President Nixon: Vice President Ford will be sworn as President at that hour in this office.
sent.trans: 尼克松总统：副总统福特在那时刻将在这个办公室宣誓就职。

sent.orig: President Cao Xumin and Vice-president Ni Rulin attended the conference.
sent.trans: 曹绪岷会长，倪如林副会长出席了会议。

sent.orig: He has met the standard of being a successful president, being an exceptional president.
sent.trans: 他达到了作为成功总统的标准，能够成为一个特别出色的总统。
